dashboard.subtitle: Here's what's happening with your HR operations.

landing.heroTitle: Streamline Your HR Operations with AI-Powered Solutions
landing.heroSubtitle: Automate recruitment, manage payroll, track performance, and ensure compliance with our comprehensive HR management platform.
landing.tryHRProSubtitle: Experience the power of AI-driven HR management. Access our demo with different user roles to see how HR Pro transforms your workplace.
landing.featuresTitle: Everything you need to manage your workforce
landing.featuresSubtitle: Powerful tools designed to streamline your HR processes and boost productivity across your organization.

feature1.title: Employee Management
feature1.description: Comprehensive employee profiles, onboarding, and lifecycle management with advanced search and filtering.

feature2.title: Performance Tracking
feature2.description: Set goals, track progress, and conduct performance reviews with automated reminders and analytics.

feature3.title: Compliance & Security
feature3.description: Ensure regulatory compliance with automated reporting, audit trails, and secure data management.

feature4.title: Time & Attendance
feature4.description: Track work hours, manage schedules, and handle leave requests with intelligent automation.

feature5.title: Analytics & Reporting
feature5.description: Get insights into workforce trends, productivity metrics, and performance analytics with customizable dashboards.

feature6.title: AI-Powered Insights
feature6.description: Leverage artificial intelligence for predictive analytics, talent recommendations, and automated workflows.

landing.testimonialsSubtitle: See what our customers say about HR Pro

testimonial1.content: HR Pro has transformed how we manage our workforce. The automation features save us hours every week.

testimonial2.content: The analytics and reporting capabilities give us insights we never had before. Highly recommended!

testimonial3.content: Implementation was smooth and the support team is exceptional. Our HR processes are now 10x more efficient.

landing.ctaTitle: Ready to transform your HR operations?
landing.ctaSubtitle: Join thousands of companies already using HR Pro to streamline their workforce management.
landing.footerDescription: Modern HR management platform designed to streamline workforce operations and boost productivity.
landing.pricingSubtitle: Choose the plan that fits your organization's needs

basicPlan.name: Basic
basicPlan.description: Perfect for small teams getting started

enterprisePlan.name: Enterprise
enterprisePlan.description: For large organizations with complex needs

landing.whyChooseSubtitle: Discover what makes us the leading HR management solution

reason1.title: AI-Powered Automation
reason1.description: Leverage artificial intelligence to automate repetitive tasks and gain predictive insights

reason2.title: Enterprise Security
reason2.description: Bank-level security with SOC 2 compliance and end-to-end encryption

reason3.title: 24/7 Support
reason3.description: Round-the-clock support from our expert team to ensure your success

reason4.title: Easy Integration
reason4.description: Seamlessly integrate with your existing tools and workflows

landing.demoAccessSubtitle: Experience the power of HR Pro with our interactive demos

administrator.title: Administrator
administrator.description: Full system control, employee management, and comprehensive analytics.

employee.title: Employee
employee.description: Self-service portal, time tracking, leave management, and personal dashboard.

hrManager.title: HR Manager
hrManager.description: Recruitment, performance management, compliance, and workforce analytics.

manager.title: Manager
manager.description: Team management, performance reviews, project tracking, and resource allocation.

trainer.title: Trainer
trainer.description: Course management, learning paths, assessments, and training analytics.

auditor.title: Auditor
auditor.description: Compliance monitoring, audit trails, risk assessment, and regulatory reporting.
